project.name: Rat Trap Chair
project.description: Customizable flat folding chair made out of wood
project.presentation:
This is foldable chair project.

First the objectives are :
  • Take no space once folded
  • Waste less wood


The chair is composed of 3 different layers. The two "external" ones (that are actually visible) are quite the same (the rear one contains extrusions for the hinge). The one in the middle supports axles and sliders.

All layers are glued together guided by wood pegs.

A mounting documentation will come soon.

The application guarantees that the chair will not be dangerous (fall).
You can tune your model by using the different parameters offered within this page.
